content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-59.5, -111.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position (-59.5, -111.5)
- Boiler at position (-46.5, -122.0)
- Offshore pump at position (-68.5, -95.5)
- Pipe connections linking the offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (-15.0, -76.0) connected to an iron chest at position (-15.5, -77.5)
- Stone furnace at position (-19.0, -73.0) fueled with coal and processing iron ore

### Copper Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position (9.0, -64.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Stone furnace at position (6.0, -62.0) with no ingredients to smelt
- Wooden chest at position (7.5, -61.5) containing iron plates
- Inserter at position (6.5, -60.5) not receiving electricity

### Miscellaneous Entities
- Various pipe groups and electricity poles scattered across the map, not all connected to active systems.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Connecting Steam Engine to Boiler
- Ensure that there are no placement blockages when attempting to connect small electric poles. Clear any obstacles before placing poles.
- Verify that you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to connect entities. Ensure you have enough small electric poles to complete the connection.

### Errors with Inserter Not Receiving Electricity
- Check that all inserters are connected to a power source. Ensure that the small electric poles are properly connected to provide power to inserters.

### Errors with Full Chests
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to prevent mining drills from halting operations.
